meanings.definition: A small, knoblike organ or part, especially one of the suckers or hooks on the head of a tapeworm, by which it attaches itself to the tissues of its host.
meanings.sent1: The scoleces of the tapeworm help it cling to the host.
meanings.sent2: Tapeworms use their scoleces to attach to the host's intestines.
meanings.sent3: The tapeworm's scoleces decided to have a race to see who could stick the longest.
meanings.sent4: The scoleces of the tapeworm are like tiny anchors in the host's body.
meanings.sent5: The tapeworm's scoleces are like tiny hooks that keep it in place.
